items.tab_coop:
cozy, stylized mobile game icon representing a community barn for a farming game.

Subject: A small wooden barn as a shared community space with a coop sign above the entrance, warm and welcoming, cartoon game UI tab icon for multiplayer
items.toolbox: Farm toolbox with tools peeking out, friendly cartoon hub icon for feature menu
items.farmboy_neutral:
Young friendly farmboy character for a cozy mobile farming game, stylized realism with clean shapes and soft detail.

Child-like proportions (slightly larger head, shorter limbs), approachable and warm.
Tousled brown hair, warm brown eyes, subtle freckles, gentle smile.
Wearing simple light-colored linen shirt and blue overalls with minimal folds and seams.
Standing relaxed, hands at sides, neutral pose.
Reduce specular highlights and plastic shine, use matte surfaces and flatter shading with softer transitions.
